strapiPost.title: Mycelium Lays Groundwork For The Future Of The InternetÂ
strapiPost.content:
Committed to the world's adoption of decentralized networks, Mycelium Networks is building the physical infrastructure needed to begin implementing Web 3.0 solutions right here in NWA. 

  • Their latest peak: Mycelium proudly participated and presented in the Web 3.0 track at the 2022 NWA Tech Summit which concluded yesterday in Bentonville.  
  • Their latest plans: Mycelium offers multiple Host Plans for individuals and businesses with payments ranging from $15-$55 per month. 

Join the growing Host Network and compare plans HERE.
